projecttitle: Establishing 13 Agricultural Communities within King Salman bin Abdulaziz's program to develop Sinai Peninsula
project_descrip: Short: ESTABLISHING 13 AGRICULTURAL COMMUNITIES WITHIN KING SALMAN BIN ABDULAZIZ'S PROGRAM TO DEVELOP SINAI PENINSULA Long: The project consists of civil works that include all necessary concrete structures to execute well-drilling works, supply and install 150 kV generators, supply and install pumps with a production capacity of 30 cubic meters per hour, and install main and secondary irrigation networks in different diameters. The project includes consultancy services, technical studies, designs, preparation of tender documents, analysis of presentations, and supervising of the implementation.
shortdescription: ESTABLISHING 13 AGRICULTURAL COMMUNITIES WITHIN KING SALMAN BIN ABDULAZIZ'S PROGRAM TO DEVELOP SINAI PENINSULA
longdescription: The project consists of civil works that include all necessary concrete structures to execute well-drilling works, supply and install 150 kV generators, supply and install pumps with a production capacity of 30 cubic meters per hour, and install main and secondary irrigation networks in different diameters. The project includes consultancy services, technical studies, designs, preparation of tender documents, analysis of presentations, and supervising of the implementation.

projecttitle: Constructing a Channel for Water Transfer within King Salman bin Abdulaziz's program to develop Sinai Peninsula
project_descrip: Short: CONSTRUCTING A CHANNEL FOR WATER TRANSFER WITHIN KING SALMAN BIN ABDULAZIZ'S PROGRAM TO DEVELOP SINAI PENINSULA Long: The project consists of constructing the 'Saharat Al Mahsama' channel with a diameter of 3.20 meters, and the 'Al Ma'khad wa Masref' channel with a diameter of one km. Expanding 'Jabali Bank' to the 'Toson Bank' by establishing a water-pumping station with drainage of one million cubic meters per day. The project includes consultancy services, technical studies, designs, preparation of tender documents, analysis of presentations, and supervising of the implementation.
shortdescription: CONSTRUCTING A CHANNEL FOR WATER TRANSFER WITHIN KING SALMAN BIN ABDULAZIZ'S PROGRAM TO DEVELOP SINAI PENINSULA
longdescription: The project consists of constructing the 'Saharat Al Mahsama' channel with a diameter of 3.20 meters, and the 'Al Ma'khad wa Masref' channel with a diameter of one km. Expanding 'Jabali Bank' to the 'Toson Bank' by establishing a water-pumping station with drainage of one million cubic meters per day. The project includes consultancy services, technical studies, designs, preparation of tender documents, analysis of presentations, and supervising of the implementation.

projecttitle: Development of Water and Sanitation Systems in Rural Areas
project_descrip: Short: DEVELOPMENT OF WATER AND SANITATION SYSTEMS IN RURAL AREAS Long: Building and rehabilitating the currently used water supply networks, increasing its production capacity through drilling 50 wells for groundwater, building pumping stations, establishing several water reservoirs at 600 cubic meters and connecting them to a 840 km distribution network to homes, social facilities, and hospitals, in addition to establishing sanitation services. The project also include civil works that aim to rehabilitate and construct irrigation systems in rural areas, sanitation services, and acquiring the project land. Funding includes providing and importing equipment, operating appliances, and maintenance, consultancy services, which include technical support, project designing, supervising the implementation, and reviewing designs and tender documents.

purposename: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

projecttitle: Kalu Ganga Left Bank Development Project
project_descrip: Short: KALU GANGA LEFT BANK DEVELOPMENT PROJECT Long: Civil Works: 1- Rehabilitating the current primary dam and saddle dams. 2- Establishing the basic foundations on Kalu Ganga Dam. 3- Constructing water transportation system from Kalu Ganga Dam to an agricultural area. 4- Developing new irrigation system in the agricultural area. 5- Rehabilitating the current irrigation system in surrounding areas.
shortdescription: KALU GANGA LEFT BANK DEVELOPMENT PROJECT
longdescription: Civil Works: 1- Rehabilitating the current primary dam and saddle dams. 2- Establishing the basic foundations on Kalu Ganga Dam. 3- Constructing water transportation system from Kalu Ganga Dam to an agricultural area. 4- Developing new irrigation system in the agricultural area. 5- Rehabilitating the current irrigation system in surrounding areas.

projecttitle: ADDITIONAL LOAN AGREEMENT KALU-GANGA DEVELOPMENT PROJECT
project_descrip: Short: ADDITIONAL LOAN AGREEMENT KALU-GANGA DEVELOPMENT PROJECT Long: The project is to create strategic water reserves and meet the increasing demand for drinking water by establishing two dams on Kaluganga River in the Central Province of Sri Lanka to irrigate about 3000 hectares of agricultural land.
shortdescription: ADDITIONAL LOAN AGREEMENT KALU-GANGA DEVELOPMENT PROJECT
longdescription: The project is to create strategic water reserves and meet the increasing demand for drinking water by establishing two dams on Kaluganga River in the Central Province of Sri Lanka to irrigate about 3000 hectares of agricultural land.

agencyname: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Center
projecttitle: Program of equipment financial supporting for Agency on Land Reclamation and Irrigation (ALRI) in Republic of Tajikistan
project_descrip: Short: PROGRAM OF EQUIPMENT FINANCIAL SUPPORTING FOR AGENCY ON LAND RECLAMATION AND IRRIGATION (ALRI) IN REPUBLIC OF TAJIKISTAN Long: The objective of the program is to assist the Agency for Land Reclamation and Irrigation in the maintenance of the works carried out in the project of concrete vents in the Bang and Jubejieh rivers to protect the villages and the population from the effects of the seasonal floodss. The number of villages benefiting from the project is 42 villages Including more than 135,000 people and 14,656 hectares of agricultural land.

longdescription: The objective of the program is to assist the Agency for Land Reclamation and Irrigation in the maintenance of the works carried out in the project of concrete vents in the Bang and Jubejieh rivers to protect the villages and the population from the effects of the seasonal floodss. The number of villages benefiting from the project is 42 villages Including more than 135,000 people and 14,656 hectares of agricultural land.

agencyname: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Center
projecttitle: Program of financial support for procurement of the Emergency and Civil Defense Committee of the Republic of Tajikistan
project_descrip: Short: PROGRAM OF FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR PROCUREMENT OF THE EMERGENCY AND CIVIL DEFENSE COMMITTEE OF THE REPUBLIC OF TAJIKISTAN Long: It is to assist the Land Reclamation and Irrigation Agency in the maintenance of the work carried out in the concrete fenders project in the Bang and Jubikiya rivers to protect the villages and the population from the effects of seasonal flooding.
shortdescription: PROGRAM OF FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR PROCUREMENT OF THE EMERGENCY AND CIVIL DEFENSE COMMITTEE OF THE REPUBLIC OF TAJIKISTAN
longdescription: It is to assist the Land Reclamation and Irrigation Agency in the maintenance of the work carried out in the concrete fenders project in the Bang and Jubikiya rivers to protect the villages and the population from the effects of seasonal flooding.

projecttitle: Development of Water Supply and Irrigation Systems in Khatoon
project_descrip: Short: DEVELOPMENT OF WATER SUPPLY AND IRRIGATION SYSTEMS IN KHATOON Long: Constructing and rehabilitating irrigation and pumping stations infrastructure on an area of 1,700 hectares, reclaiming 7,000 hectares of agricultural lands that are not currently utilized due to the absence of irrigation systems, in addition to rehabilitating and developing drinking water supply system with a guarantee of sustainable functionality. The project includes civil works, which consist of establishing and developing irrigation and water drainage systems, constructing and rehabilitating reservoirs, concrete channels, as well as well-digging, installing water distribution pipes and rehabilitating water supply and sanitation systems in rural areas, including Kanqar area. Funding includes providing special equipment for pumping stations, equipping the project implementation unit, microfinancing, giving consultancy services, making preferred designs, and supervising the implementation of the project.
shortdescription: DEVELOPMENT OF WATER SUPPLY AND IRRIGATION SYSTEMS IN KHATOON
longdescription: Constructing and rehabilitating irrigation and pumping stations infrastructure on an area of 1,700 hectares, reclaiming 7,000 hectares of agricultural lands that are not currently utilized due to the absence of irrigation systems, in addition to rehabilitating and developing drinking water supply system with a guarantee of sustainable functionality. The project includes civil works, which consist of establishing and developing irrigation and water drainage systems, constructing and rehabilitating reservoirs, concrete channels, as well as well-digging, installing water distribution pipes and rehabilitating water supply and sanitation systems in rural areas, including Kanqar area. Funding includes providing special equipment for pumping stations, equipping the project implementation unit, microfinancing, giving consultancy services, making preferred designs, and supervising the implementation of the project.

projecttitle: Construction and Rehabilitation of Alat Pumping Station in Bukhara Region
project_descrip: Short: CONSTRUCTION AND REHABILITATION OF ALAT PUMPING STATION IN BUKHARA REGION Long: Project to ensure that water is provided to agricultural fields to reduce crop losses. Increasing the economic output of irrigated agricultural lands in Bukhara region.-Civil Works: Rehabilitating the auxiliary pumping station in Alat.- Electrical and mechanical works for the second pumping station in Alat.

longdescription: Project to ensure that water is provided to agricultural fields to reduce crop losses.
